[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Extensions](./blockly.extensions_namespace.md) &gt; [registerMutator](./blockly.extensions_namespace.registermutator_1_function.md)

## Extensions.registerMutator() function

Registers a new extension function that adds a mutator to the block. At register time this performs some basic sanity checks on the mutator. The wrapper may also add a mutator dialog to the block, if both compose and decompose are defined on the mixin.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function registerMutator(name: string, mixinObj: any, opt_helperFn?: () => any, opt_blockList?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of this mutator extension. |
|  mixinObj | any | The values to mix in. |
|  opt\_helperFn | () =&gt; any | <i>(Optional)</i> An optional function to apply after mixing in the object. |
|  opt\_blockList | string\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> A list of blocks to appear in the flyout of the mutator dialog. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} if the mutation is invalid or can't be applied to the block.
